name: About me
description: A simple, one page, introduction to the owner

stories.name: HTML and CSS
stories.description: Code the HTML and CSS for the page.
requirements: The header should be sticky to the top of the page while the user scrolls content below

stories.name: Mobile design
stories.description: On mobile the site follows the pattern in the attached resource.
requirements: Images are scaled down or smaller images are used on mobile. Images should not be cropped or cut.
